titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Faculty Senate records ARCH020
titlestmt.author: Transcribed to ArchivesSpace from word document finding aid by Tiffany Crawford in Dec. 2015, under the supervision of Sean Parke.

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Hartford Archives & Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-02-15 15:30:25 -0500.

repository.corpname: University of Hartford Archives & Special Collections

did.abstract: The collection consists of faculty senate meeting minutes, committee records, and subject files from 1960 to 2014.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers. However, due to the intermittent presence of confidential and/or sensitive materials which are restricted under the University Archives restriction protocols, all requested materials must be reviewed by the Archivist prior to granting access to the records.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials in this collection may be protected by copyright law (U.S. Code: Title 17). Any use of the material which exceeds fair use requires permission from the copyright holder. Researchers are solely responsible for obtaining the proper permission(s) for their use of the material.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The faculty senate is the official organization of the faculty of the University of Hartford. The senate includes representation of all of the schools of the University. Representatives are elected for three year terms.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: In 2015, the call number was changed from D20 to ARCH020 to avoid duplication.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of faculty senate meeting minutes, committee records, and subject files from 1960 to 2014. The collection documents the academic issues and decisions made by the Faculty Senate primarily concerning faculty policies and curriculum of the University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in three series: 1. Minutes and other meeting records, II. Committees, III. Subject Files.

did.unittitle: Bent, Larsen, Trachtenberg, and Master Teachers Awards

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The file includes correspondence of/with: C. Guardo Provost, Intercampus, Inter-senate, S.J. Trachtenberg, and others.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: File contains information about the Emeriti Association, as well as Gordon Clark Ramsey. Included is Ramsey's CD "Edwardian Music for Organ."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes a 3.5 inch floppy disk labelled "Grants Committee 2004-2005 Academic Year."

did.unittitle: Purchasing Dept. Policy and Procedures Manual
